-1.title: House of God 1
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: House of God is a new eight part series that explores the unbreakable bond between people of faith and God in the Greater Toronto Area. This first of it's kind program explores the lives of Priests, Rabbis, Imam's, pastors and worshipers as it highlights the love and passion they have for their place of worship and God. Each episode will explore two places of worship in the GTA. It will explore the history of each location of worship and take a look at the contemporary life of various communities that make up the tapestry of multiculturalism that is the GTA. The viewer explores and learns about the significance of these Houses of God for it's followers and learns about Toronto's rich culture and history.
imdb.title: House of God Season 2

The viewer explores and learns about the significance of these Houses of God for it's followers and learns about Toronto's rich culture and history.::Igal Hecht & Aaron Daniel Mandel
